001_SITREP

THE OLD PLAYBOOK
IS BROKEN.

"If you’re an SEO, your playbook is out of date. You’re preparing for a world where rankings don’t exist."

For two decades, we optimized for Ten Blue Links. We built links, we targeted keywords, and we measured traffic. It was a predictable game with stable rules.

Old_Metric

“How much traffic did we get?”

New_Metric

“What does AI say when your customers talk to it?”

The_Shift

AI Answer Engines (ChatGPT, Perplexity, SearchGPT) don't care about your backlinks. They care about Information Gain. They don't send traffic; they synthesize answers. In a world with no stable maps, your only real advantage is VELOCITY_OF_LEARNING.

The New Rules of Engagement:

  • 01 Optimize for the Answer, not the Click.
  • 02 Own the Data Source, not the Aggregator.
  • 03 Build Brand Gravity to bypass search entirely.

We are building the lab for this new reality. A place to test, break, and rebuild our understanding of search in real-time.

Onboarding_Protocol

OUR_30_DAY_PROMISE

We don't just dump you in a Slack channel. We have a structured onboarding process to ensure you get value from Day 1.

01

Immediate Access

You'll get an invite to the private Slack and the Learning Portal. Introduce yourself in #introductions and get your first "High Signal" welcome pack.

02

The "State of AI Search" Audit

In your first week, you'll receive our proprietary audit template. Run it on your brand (or your client's) to establish a baseline for AI visibility.

03

Founder Onboarding Call

Join a small-group call with Tom & Jeremy. We'll review your audit results and help you prioritize your roadmap for the next 90 days.

04

First Lab Session

Attend your first bi-weekly strategy call. Bring a specific challenge, get feedback from the room. No recording, Chatham House Rules.
